Wasim says: he's glad that he lost against their brothers
wat ever mistakes that we made today shud be rectified by the next match
Aminul Islam gets a cheque for $6000
Aminul says: i'am jus too excited after this victory
on behalf of our team i'd like to thank them for their contribution
today our bowlers really clicked, and batsmen played really well
i'am really grateful to them
i'am expecting our Prime Minister to have some prizes ready for us
Khalid Mahmud is Man of the Match
was a pretty slow wicket, managed to click here
its certainly a great day for the people of Bangladesh
and we are looking forward to test match standards
